title: Engineered triphenylphosphonium-based, mitochondrial-targeted liposomal drug delivery system facilitates cancer cell killing actions of chemotherapeutics
content:
RSC Chem. Biol., 2024, 5,236-248
DOI: 10.1039/D3CB00219E, Paper

Subramaniyam Sivagnanam, Kiran Das, Ieshita Pan, Adele Stewart, Atanu Barik, Biswanath Maity, Priyadip Das
Lip-DT represents an important proof-of-concept exercise demonstrating that functionalized PCDA/DMPC-based liposomes have great promise for the development of new imaging probes and targeted drug-delivery vehicles.
